is a small town in Pathanamthitta district in
.  This is an island in Pampa River. Mannar is a small town across the Pampa river near Parumala.
Chengannur Railway Station is at a distance of 10 kilometers. The place is well connected by buses from Thiruvalla, Chengannur and Kayamkulam.
Taxis and auto rickshaws are available at affordable rates.

value: content=It is here that Geevarghese Mar Gregorios the first declared saint of The Malankara Orthodox Syrian Church is entombed. The commemoration ormapperunnal is celebrated on the first and second of every November, and a large number of people flock to this place for worship. People prefer to get here at that time by walking from all over the Nation. The government recognised Parumala Church is known as the International Pilgrim Center.
content=Temple considered one of the oldest in Kerala.

This temple is related to Kadamattathu Kathanar.
